item.title: Weird dinner last Friday
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I recalled it was a weird dinner last Friday … One guy from US came to visit Shanghai so we had dinner together, during the dinner I found 4 people there are: myself, my ex-boss who’s working for Microsoft now, my ex-boss’ boss (the visitor, and will move to Microsoft in September), and my ex-boss’ [...]
item.content:encoded:
I recalled it was a weird dinner last Friday …

One guy from US came to visit Shanghai so we had dinner together, during the dinner I found 4 people there are: myself, my ex-boss who’s working for Microsoft now, my ex-boss’ boss (the visitor, and will move to Microsoft in September), and my ex-boss’ boss’ boss (that’s my boss now).

Glad to see I got upraded – my current boss was my boss’ boss in my last project, and he was my boss’ boss’ boss in the my project prior to that.
